title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
2. In a pan, cook pancetta with garlic until crispy.
3. Beat eggs and mix with cheese.
4. Combine pasta with pancetta, then remove from heat and mix in egg mixture.
5. Season with salt and pepper, and serve.
